answers.answer: Omnify aims to build essential DeFi infrastructure on 15+ networks, offering services like multisender, payments, and escrow, which enhance the ecosystem. The project is focused on innovative financial applications that leverage the blockchain's capabilities. It also includes strategies to improve user experience through its various services.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer:
Omnify prides itself on manifesting the potential of the crypto space by offering unprecedented cryptocurrency services. These services will become the cornerstone of how business is conducted on the blockchain.

üîÄ OmniTransfers - Omnify's Multisender

OmniTransfers are Omnify‚Äôs crypto multisender or bulk sender. With it you can transfer many different assets to multiple recipients in the same transaction.


‚ôæÔ∏è OmniPay - Cryptocurrency Payments

Omnify boasts a cryptocurrency payments suite that covers all your payment use cases: Full payments, Installments, Refundable Receipts, and reusable Pay Me links are what OmniPay brings to the table.


üéÅ OmniTrust - Cryptocurrency Deposits

With OmniTrust you can unleash your crypto assets by creating a deposit that supports any ERC20 or native tokens on all our supported networks. You can specify whether you want to be able to modify, retract, or allow other beneficiaries to withdraw from your deposit. With daily allowances being set or modified by any of the deposit‚Äôs owners.


üß© OmniBridge - Crypto Bridge

Now you can instantly bridge crypto across all of Omnify‚Äôs supported networks instantly. With fees being the least of your concerns since OmniBridge is the cheapest crypto bridge at record low fees. A 1:1 peg is maintained by using a lock & mint strategy on the source and destination chains. Then, the bridged assets are burned when returning them to the source chain.


ü§ù OmniEscrow - Coin Auctions

Omnify‚Äôs crypto escrow service is a brand new way of safely auctioning and trading crypto tokens. It is a peer-to-peer way of exchanging crypto coins. On OmniEscrow, anybody can create an escrow contract on any of our supported networks. Then, they can share the contract‚Äôs ID to receive bids and trade their offered assets with someone else‚Äôs.

answers.question: For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]‚Äîfor example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Omnify Finance
project.description:
Omnify is a DeFi platform offering a variety of services. It aims to make it easier for businesses and individuals to use blockchain technology. 
Omnify provides 5 key services: 

* Transfers: token bulk sender
* Payments: native cryptocurrency payments
* Trust: private deposits
* Bridge: 1:1 pegged bridge 
* Escrow: P2P coin auctions and trading
